name: pnp-devproxy-spfx
title: Preset for SharePoint Framework solutions
shortDescription: This sample contains a preset for simulating Microsoft Graph and SharePoint API errors for use with SharePoint Framework solutions. It contains specific URL exclusion rules to ensure that the API behind the hosted SPFx workbench is not intercepted by the proxy.
longDescription: This sample contains a preset for simulating Microsoft Graph and SharePoint API errors for use with SharePoint Framework solutions. It contains specific URL exclusion rules to ensure that the API behind the hosted SPFx workbench is not intercepted by the proxy.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy simulating API errors for an SPFx solution

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
